Set the most common well inputs

Set the most common well inputs

setWellInput(field.name = "HAGBR.GUO", well.name = "ExampleGuo",
  depth.wh = 0, depth.bh = 9700, diam.in = 1.995, GLR = 75,
  liq.rt = 758, wcut = 0.1, thp = 200, tht = 80, bht = 180,
  API = 40, gas.sg = 0.7, wat.sg = 1.05, oil.visc = 5, ed = 6e-04,
  if.tens = 30, salinity = 0, U = 8, oil.cp = 0.53, gas.cp = 0.5,
  wat.cp = 1, angle = pi/2)

Arguments

field.name

field name. Usually comprises several wells
well.name

well name
depth.wh

depth at wellhead
depth.bh

depth at bottomhole of well feet
diam.in

well diameter inches
GLR

gas liquid ratio
liq.rt

liquid rate
wcut

watercut
thp

tubing head pressure
tht

tubing head temperature
bht

bottomhole temperature
API

gravity of oil
gas.sg

specific gravity of gas
wat.sg

specific gravity of water
oil.visc

oil viscosity
ed

relative rougness
if.tens

interfacial tension between ...
salinity

water salinity
U

overall heat transfer coefficient
oil.cp

heat capacity of oil
gas.cp

heat capacity of gas
wat.cp

heat capacity of water
angle

angle of the well to the horizontal

Contents

  • Arguments
